mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.username, u.phone_number, u.password, u.ho_va_ten, u.ma_so_thue, u.bank_name, u.bank_number, u.description, u.role_id, u.is_active, u.created_at, u.created_by, u.updated_at, u.updated_by, u.is_deleted, r.role_name FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON u.role_id = r.id WHERE u.user_id = #{id} AND u.is_deleted = 0

SELECT u.user_id, u.username, u.phone_number, u.password, u.ho_va_ten, u.ma_so_thue, u.bank_name, u.bank_number, u.description, u.role_id, u.is_active, u.created_at, u.created_by, u.updated_at, u.updated_by, u.is_deleted, r.role_name FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON u.role_id = r.id WHERE u.is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user (user_id, username, phone_number, password, ho_va_ten, ma_so_thue, bank_name, bank_number, description, role_id, is_active, created_by, updated_by) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{phoneNumber}, #{password}, #{fullName}, #{taxCode}, #{bankName}, #{bankNumber}, #{description}, #{roleId}, #{isActive}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy})
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET username = #{username}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, password = #{password}, ho_va_ten = #{fullName}, ma_so_thue = #{taxCode}, bank_name = #{bankName}, bank_number = #{bankNumber}, description = #{description}, role_id = #{roleId}, is_active = #{isActive}, updated_by = #{updatedBy} WHERE user_id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM sys_user WHERE user_id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0)
